mapper.select:
select prime.measure_value, prime.unit_code, prime.comment_text, prime.statistical_stratum, prime.location_category, prime.location_status, prime.reference_location_type_code, prime.reference_location_start_date, prime.reference_location_end_date prime.resource_title, prime.resource_creator, prime.resource_subject, prime.resource_publisher, prime.resource_date, prime.resource_identifier, prime.organization, prime.organization_name, prime.site_id, prime.project_identifier, prime.data_source, filter.result_count
order by prime.data_source_id, prime.organization, prime.project_id, prime.site_id
